00030   if (argc < 2) {

00032             "\n   -A             show all eigenstates\n", argv[0]);
00033     exit(-1);

00045     case 'A':
00046       all=1;

00061 
00062   int a,b; 
00063 
00064   void* trme[n*n]; 
00065 
00066   for (b=0; b<n; b++)   
00067     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00068       trme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpTimeReversal);
00069     }
00070 
00071   // read or calculate matrix elements
00072   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00073     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00074       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P, 
00075                                     &OpTimeReversal, S[a], S[b], trme[a+b*n])) {
00076         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpTimeReversal, &Q[a], &Q[b], 
00077                           S[a], S[b], trme[a+b*n]);
00078         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P, 
00079                                  &OpTimeReversal, S[a], S[b], trme[a+b*n]);
00080       }
00081     }

00090   // calculate expectation values
